title: Google Calendar Integration for Atlas
context:
Jim wants Atlas to check and update his Google Calendar. This would require:

1. Google Calendar API integration via MCP server
2. Core capabilities needed:
   - Read calendar events
   - Create/update appointments  
   - Check availability
   - Delete/modify existing events
3. Work Queue integration for deadline tracking
4. Meeting prep automation potential
5. Time blocking for research sessions

Technical approach: Build MCP server similar to existing pit-crew and notion servers. Use Google Calendar API v3 with OAuth2 authentication. Store refresh tokens securely.

This would significantly enhance Atlas productivity capabilities by enabling calendar management through conversational interface.
